thread.title: Wow! Look Upon Colby Rasmus's Beard, And Puke
thread.title_full: Wow! Look Upon Colby Rasmus's Beard, And Puke

author: Lindsey Adler
title: Wow! Look Upon Colby Rasmus's Beard, And Puke
text:
There’s no polite way to say this: These photos of Colby Rasmus are the worst thing I’ve ever seen. Advertisement 
Ostensibly, Rasmus is a person with feelings and all that nonsense, but it doesn’t seem like he’s a person who owns a mirror, judging by these portraits he posed for after reporting to the Tampa Bay Rays’ spring training. 
As a matter of procedure, it must be said that Rasmus’s disgusting, neck-only beard is an impressive commitment to becoming a true Florida Man. Advertisement
